about.summary: In putative Transcription Factor Binding Sites (TFBSs)  identification from sequence/alignments, we are interested in the significance of certain match score. TFMPvalue provides the accurate calculation of P-value with  score threshold for Position Weight Matrices,  or the score with given P-value.  It is an interface to code originally made available by  Helene Touzet and Jean-Stephane Varre, 2007,  Algorithms Mol Biol:2, 15. Touzet and Varre (2007) <DOI:10.1186/1748-7188-2-15>.

name: r-tfmpvalue
raw_meta_yaml:
{% set version = '0.0.8' %}

{% set posix = 'm2-' if win else '' %}
{% set native = 'm2w64-' if win else '' %}

package:
  name: r-tfmpvalue
  version: {{ version|replace("-", "_") }}

source:
  fn: TFMPvalue_{{ version }}.tar.gz
  url:
    - {{ cran_mirror }}/src/contrib/TFMPvalue_{{ version }}.tar.gz
    - {{ cran_mirror }}/src/contrib/Archive/TFMPvalue/TFMPvalue_{{ version }}.tar.gz
  sha256: 6d052529f7b59d0384edc097f724f70468013777b6adf4c63e61a359029d3841

build:
  merge_build_host: True  # [win]
  number: 1002
  rpaths:
    - lib/R/lib/
    - lib/

# Suggests: testthat
requirements:
  build:
    - {{ compiler('c') }}        # [not win]
    - {{ compiler('cxx') }}      # [not win]
    - {{ compiler('m2w64_c') }}        # [win]
    - {{ compiler('m2w64_cxx') }}        # [win]
    - {{ posix }}filesystem        # [win]
    - {{ posix }}make
    - {{ posix }}sed               # [win]
    - {{ posix }}coreutils         # [win]
    - {{ posix }}zip               # [win]

  host:
    - r-base
    - r-rcpp >=0.11.1

  run:
    - r-base
    - {{ native }}gcc-libs         # [win]
    - r-rcpp >=0.11.1

test:
  commands:
    - $R -e "library('TFMPvalue')"           # [not win]
    - "\"%R%\" -e \"library('TFMPvalue')\""  # [win]

about:
  home: https://github.com/ge11232002/TFMPvalue
  license: GPL-2
  summary: In putative Transcription Factor Binding Sites (TFBSs)  identification from sequence/alignments,
    we are interested in the significance of certain match score. TFMPvalue provides
    the accurate calculation of P-value with  score threshold for Position Weight Matrices,  or
    the score with given P-value.  It is an interface to code originally made available
    by  Helene Touzet and Jean-Stephane Varre, 2007,  Algorithms Mol Biol:2, 15. Touzet
    and Varre (2007) <DOI:10.1186/1748-7188-2-15>.
  license_family: GPL2
  license_file: '{{ environ["PREFIX"] }}/lib/R/share/licenses/GPL-2'

extra:
  recipe-maintainers:
    - conda-forge/r
    - dpryan79
    - MathiasHaudgaard
    - FrodePedersen
    - ArneKr
    - johanneskoester
    - bgruening
    - daler
    - jdblischak
smithy_version:
No azure token. Create a token and
put it in ~/.conda-smithy/azure.token
3.7.0
